Hello people!

I recently made an in game version of the very popular show, Top Gear and I was wondering if it was any good.

My main goal with this was to make something different to the usual 'Challenge.' So I got to work and decided to make the intro, studio and everything else. (With exception to the star in a car.) So far it has taken me a while to get done but I think it is pretty good. This episode I decided to take them caravaning in KSP which in typical Top Gear fashion went absolutly wrong.

If you wish to take a look at it you can so here:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/24P6fJ2VlCo?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
 rpono0k 
Please tell me what you think about it and/or how I could improve it!

From, TheBlockRoom. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

Haha! Brilliant!

I watch Top Gear regularly and I think this is a very nice idea. Well done!
Thanks a lot! Is there anything you think that could be improved to make it even better? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Also if anybody has any ideas for improvement then be sure to let me know! Thanks ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
